name: alert
description: denotes messages expressing concerns related to billing alarms enforcing an upper threshold on costs.

name: area
description: denotes messages expressing concerns related to server or instance geographical location.

name: awareness
description: denotes messages simply mentioning concerns with cost (without necessarily implying action).

name: billing_mode
description: denotes messages expressing concerns related to the type of billing plan being used (e.g., on-demand for development or normal plan for production).

name: cluster
description: denotes messages expressing concerns related to cluster configuration.

name: domain
description: denotes messages expressing concerns related to domain name system and IP addresses.

name: feature
description: denotes messages expressing concerns related to various features such as logging, load balancers or usage of third party libraries.

name: increase
description: denotes messages expressing concerns related to increase in cost due to a change.

name: instance
description: denotes messages expressing concerns related to computational instances (e.g., Amazon AWS t2.micro) used in the deployment.

name: networking
description: denotes messages expressing concerns related to networking configuration.

name: policy
description: denotes messages expressing concerns related to the implementation of general rules to prevent excessive charges.

name: provider
description: denotes messages expressing concerns related to choosing a service providers (e.g., Amazon, Azure, Google)

name: saving
description: denotes mentioned changes made to save costs.

name: storage
description: denotes messages expressing concerns related to storage solutions (e.g., Amazon gp2) used in the deployment.
